explanation:
### Create a new session  
 Hi! Awesome that you drop by!  
 Here you can create a new session. Just fill in the required data in the formular on the right side and in just a few seconds your audience members will be able to log into this session with the corresponding session code. Direct and honest feeedback guaranteed! :)  
 If you activiate the option 'Captcha needed' the participants who would like to join your session first have to solve a so called _Captcha_. We encourage you to activate this option during big and anonymous events and lectures, to prevent mis- and abuse.
